title: Arrivederci B*tches!
description:
Jackie chronicles her pre-flight meltdown, controversial social opinions and housewife evaluations while chugging wine and taking Zyrtec. 
 

The Bitch Bible is proudly brought to you by:

Fabletics: Fabletics is offering you 2 leggings worth $99 for only $24. Just head over to Fabletics.com/bible.
